segments.text: I feel so bad for the woman, standing there in the water like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just trying to do her chores, and everything is going wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is being so reckless, and she doesn’t even see it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl is just watching, not helping at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is ruining the floor, and she’s just standing there, oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s going to slip any second, and it’s going to hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so close to falling, and no one is stopping him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the cookie jar almost empty, and I wonder if it’s even worth the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene makes me feel helpless, like I should do something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the garden outside is so peaceful, but inside, it’s a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman deserves better than this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
